main event: A UFO sighting was reported in San Juan, Puerto Rico on 9 February 1965 involving an unidentified flying object observed for about 2 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as round with a dual top and flat bottom, approximately the size of a basketball,It had six red perimeter lights,One observer claimed the object had no sound and seemed to move straight and level,The UFO disappeared suddenly as if its lights were extinguished,Both observers were considered reliable individuals on duty at a naval station.
witness description: PFC Arelius J. Hargut, USMC and William I. Allen, GMG 3, USN, both were on duty.
